function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate negative pressure in patient rooms and anterooms","Impact":"Increased risk of pathogen spread and contamination","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and monitoring of negative air machines","Technologies":"High efficiency particulate air filters, dual portable devices","People":"Medical personnel, patients, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, infection control team"},{"Description":"Unclear guidelines for pressure differentials and air changes per hour","Impact":"Inconsistent implementation of effective containment measures","Mitigation":"Alignment with CDC and other authoritative guidelines, regular updates based on new information","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Facility management, infection control team","Owner":"Healthcare regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Inadequate maintenance and monitoring of negative air machines","Impact":"Unreliable and unstable negative pressure, increased risk of pathogen spread","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance schedule, monitoring and replacement of machine parts","Technologies":"High efficiency particulate air filters, dual portable devices","People":"Maintenance staff, facility management","Owner":"Facility management, maintenance department"}]}
